name: Desert Race
description:
A racing game created for a school project using the unreal engine. I did have a menu screen but for some reason it didn't want to package with it so this is the best I could give.

It is possible to drive around a bit, but you need to go through the checkpoints marked by the flags around the map to actually complete a lap. If you get stuck the car will reset to the last checkpoint.

Have fun, and try beating 0.55.3!
